mapper.select: SELECT shop_name, shop_tel, shop_loc, shop_notice, shop_opentime, shop_closetime FROM shop WHERE member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE shop SET shop_name=#{name}, shop_tel=#{tel}, shop_loc=#{loc}, shop_notice=#{notice}, shop_opentime=#{opentime}, shop_closetime=#{closetime} WHERE member_id=#{member_id} AND
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCount FROM reservation WHERE member_name=(SELECT member_name FROM member where member_id=#{id})
AND reservation_status = #{status}
SELECT reservation_status, count(*) as reservationTotal from reservation WHERE member_name=(SELECT member_name FROM member where member_id=#{id}) GROUP by reservation_status
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_pw=HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{pw1}, 'teamc')) WHERE member_id=#{member_id}
UPDATE reservation SET reservation_status="cancel" WHERE member_name=(SELECT member_name FROM member where member_id=#{id}) AND shop_no=#{shop_no}
mapper.select: SELECT s.*, l.member_no FROM shop s JOIN shop_like l ON s.shop_no = l.shop_no WHERE l.member_no=(SELECT member_no FROM member where member_id=#{id}) ORDER BY l.shop_no DESC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{lastPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) as totalCountBookmark, s.*, l.member_no FROM shop s JOIN shop_like l ON s.shop_no = l.shop_no WHERE l.member_no=(SELECT member_no FROM member where member_id=#{id})
SELECT * FROM shop WHERE member_no=(SELECT member_no FROM member where member_id=#{member_id})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shop (shop_name, shop_tel, shop_loc, shop_gu, shop_opentime, shop_closetime, shop_notice, member_no) VALUES (#{shop_name}, #{shop_tel}, #{shop_loc}, (SELECT shop_gu FROM shop_gu WHERE shop_gu=#{shop_gu}), #{shop_opentime}, #{shop_closetime}, #{shop_notice}, (SELECT member_no FROM member WHERE member_id=#{id}))
